targets.query:
from(bucket: "$INFLUX_BUCKET")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "blockchain" and r._field == "block_lag")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "$INFLUX_BUCKET")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "filesystem" and r._field == "chainstate_gb")
  |> last()
